name: Mekafusion #1 BM01-BRAVE
description:
Model: BM01-BRAVE ( Base Mekanoid no.01 - BRAVE )
Series: BEAST 

★ Properties
• Type: Base Mekanoid
• Skills: Survival tactics, hunting
• Perks: Brute strength

A Base Mekanoid soldier model main component unit for Mekafusion BEAST series. Designed as Brute fighters, they are programmed with survival and hunting skills. 

★ Mekafusion [ Mekanic Fusion ] 
An alliance between Meka and Meta to join forces to form ultimate machines.

Collect Mekanical robots in different series of factions in the Metaverse.



★★★★★
